item.title: Student Who Shot 2 Others at Colorado School Was ‘Radicalized,’ Officials Say

item.title: Charlie Kirk Was Practicing Politics the Right Way
item.description: The foundation of a free society is the ability to participate in politics without fear of violence. To lose that is to risk losing everything.

item.title: Can a New York City Mayoral Candidate Be Taken Off the Ballot?

item.title: Nadine Menendez, Wife of a Senator, Sentenced to 4 1/2 Years for Bribery Scheme

item.title: Carney Unveils Major Projects for Canada to Offset Damage of Trump’s Tariffs
item.description: Prime Minister Mark Carney unveiled big infrastructure plans. But they are likely to meet resistance from Indigenous and environmental groups.
